website_summaries.verdict: This inexpensive, lightweight vacuum handles hardwood and linoleum floors without issue. Can be used in upright or handheld mode.
pros: The compact, lightweight design makes this a great option for anyone with mobility issues or those who live in a small space
If you are looking for a straightforward vacuum for light jobs, this is a great option
cons: Cleaning the brush is difficult as it becomes clogged with dust and hair easily
The cord is not retractable and must be wrapped around hooks on the vacuum

customer_reviews.title: Would be nice if the on-off and floor or carpet switch would ...
customer_reviews.text: lots of power. cleans well on carpeting. Would be nice if the on-off and floor or carpet switch would be higher. have to bend down for that. Filter is small so have to clean more often, but all in all it works great.
customer_reviews.author: suzette braatz

customer_reviews.title: I recommend this HIGHLY!!!
customer_reviews.text: This is a WONDERFUL vacuum cleaner! It picks up more than I anticipated, and as a matter of fact after I vacuumed the house, I was surprised my dog still had any hair left on her!!! It picked up so much of her hair (lol)! The canister is very easy to empty, and the hand vac is very easy to use as well. I looked at many units before picking this one and I'm really glad I settled on this one as it is perfect for my needs.
customer_reviews.author: Perky Vixen

customer_reviews.title: Pretty much a failure
customer_reviews.text: I bought this to pick up cat litter my cats scatter from their cat box. ( I have 3 and they get carried away). It is just not effective for that purpose. This is all I needed it for. It is used on tile in my bathroom and nothing else. It usually spits the litter back out. Pretty much a failure, but I keep trying.
customer_reviews.author: DianneK

customer_reviews.title: Could be better
customer_reviews.text: Once I put it together, I could not release the 'hand vac'.....directions talked about pushing a 'button' which is not to be found!!! Dirt Devil Support emailed me an answer about how to remove the hand vac, and said "there is NO button'' for release. Just carefully pull apart....even with WD-40 spray: won't budge. It is light weight, easy to maneuver, easy to empty. For another $20 I probably would have found a better product.
customer_reviews.author: Sally B

customer_reviews.title: Not Effective
customer_reviews.text: Extremely ineffective. If it is advertised as a pet hair vacuum, it should work on pet hair, right? I have to empty it about every three second in order for it to work at all on dog hair, not because the dirt reservoir gets full but because the brush will just stop spinning... I knew it was cheap but I wasn't expecting a piece of crap. Not worth the money I paid for it.
customer_reviews.author: R. Lilly

customer_reviews.title: Great while it lasted, all 20 days....
customer_reviews.text: A great little vacuum, until the head stopped spinning. Didn't even last a month. Sad, when it worked it picked up really well. No matter how many times I removed hair from the brush, it just stops working after a couple of seconds.
customer_reviews.author: Richard

customer_reviews.title: Not for individuals with pets and pet hair.
customer_reviews.text: This product is very light weight which I needed as I'm disabled. Its very easy to use and maneuver. It describes it as a good vacuum for people with animals and dog hair but my very first time using it the dog hair immediately got tandled around the roller and after working on it forever and getting the hair free it automatically happened again. It would b a great vacuum for someone with no animals.
customer_reviews.author: Holly Lockey

customer_reviews.title: The suction power is nearly non existent.
customer_reviews.text: I had high hopes for this vacuum. I bought it for vacuuming a carpeted staircase. It didn't pick up anything. I'm completely disgusted.
customer_reviews.author: 'Pollo's Mom

customer_reviews.title: Brush head is faulty.
customer_reviews.text: It is not worth the money. It’s worth maybe $20. It’s best as a hand held stand alone vacuum. The rotary brush keeps getting stuck and barely picks up anything.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good product for light vacuuming!
customer_reviews.text: This is a wonderful product for light vacuuming and cleaning; reasonable priced.
customer_reviews.author: auntiejae

customer_reviews.title: does not have much power
customer_reviews.text: Used for every day quick cleaning does not have much power
customer_reviews.author: shirley ann walker

customer_reviews.title: Awesome vacuum
customer_reviews.text: Excellent/does a great job for touch-ups between big vacuum cleaning.
customer_reviews.author: TheresaM.Gratis

customer_reviews.title: Light weight and easy to use
customer_reviews.text: Love how light weight it is and it was very easy to assemble. My 10 yr old son was even able to assemble it himself. Great product and definitely picks up the pet hair off my rugs well.
customer_reviews.author: Dena J

customer_reviews.title: Great value. Eat dust, swiffer!
customer_reviews.text: Works great for light vacuuming. Good cord length, great little filtration system for its size. Not great on short pile carpets. Vacuums pet hair and people hair. My wife's long hair does tend to get wrapped around the brush roller. Versatile with the included attachments. Good value for us! Great for bathroom tile cleanup, kitchen hardwood cleanup and hardwood stairway cleanup. Since this purchase, I don't think we will be getting our swiffer out again.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: This vacuum is pretty nice and does the job well.It is perfect for dorms since it is small and easy to store
customer_reviews.author: Burak

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for us so far.
customer_reviews.text: Have only had it for a short time, but it works extremely well on solid flooring and on dog hair, the dog hair attachment works great on stairs and furniture. I do handle with care because its so lightweight and am afraid of breaking something, but its super easy to use and carry about and simple to assemble and disassemble to use as a handheld or to clean filter. Does work well on carpeting as well, but it is on the smaller side so it takes a bit longer then our large vacuum, but since its so easy to use, not a big deal.
customer_reviews.author: Mike A Haltom

customer_reviews.title: Not for pet hair
customer_reviews.text: I’ve had this less than a year and the rollers on the bottom are constantly stopping when I vacuum. It makes vacuuming a small area rug take 30 minutes and I’m never satisfied with the outcome ☹️ Definitely not pet hair proof.
customer_reviews.author: Chanel

customer_reviews.title: confusing pricing
customer_reviews.text: I was buying prior model, for 34+ and then I thought I was getting newer model for 36.+. Instead I was charged 59.00.I do not know why, I thought there were more attachments. Linda Bentley lindabentleyre@gmail.com
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Avoid at all costs.
customer_reviews.text: The brush motor would power a decent toy train but dies violently every time the brush encounters a spec of dirt or hair. Don't waste your money or time with this awful product.
customer_reviews.author: D H

customer_reviews.title: BRUSH ROLLER BROKE
customer_reviews.text: Brush roller broke within a month of using. I cleaned out all of the hair trapped in roller, but it still will not turn. DO NOT BUY IF YOU WANT SOMETHING THAT LASTS.
customer_reviews.author: Joshua

customer_reviews.title: Lots of Bang for the Buck!
customer_reviews.text: I was pleasantly pleased with my new Stick Vac from Dirt Devil - especially when my husband's eyes popped open, when he saw the powerful suction and amount of animal fur it picked up! VERY pleased!
customer_reviews.author: Connie E. Hall

customer_reviews.title: Great  vacuum
customer_reviews.text: Just received today and wow i absolutely love it! Works super well great transitioning from hardwood to carpet! and has powerful suction.
customer_reviews.author: k

customer_reviews.title: Cheap and too light! Base won't sit on floor on its own!
customer_reviews.text: You get what you pay for! Base will not stay down on it's own and you have to keep pushing it down for the brushes to stay on the floor. Total waste of money. :(
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Nope! Not Happy
customer_reviews.text: This item isn't very powerful. It leaves pet hair behind,and the hand tool doesn't do a good job on furniture. I feel like I wasted my money. If rather use my broom . 2 stars for construction and easy to assemble.
customer_reviews.author: Moniquebailey24

customer_reviews.title: Just what I wanted
customer_reviews.text: Is just what I wanted. Light weight and does a great job. Glad to get back to corded because I'm tired of worrying if the battery die. Do wish the dirt cup was a little larger.
customer_reviews.author: Phoebe

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Amazing. Easy. My 4 and 5 year old use to vacuum.
customer_reviews.author: KO

customer_reviews.title: On the first use it stopped spinning halfway through the ...
customer_reviews.text: On the first use it stopped spinning halfway through the first room. Do not suggest if your floor needs any actual cleaning.
customer_reviews.author: Amanda Bryan

customer_reviews.title: Suction is 1 on a scale of 1 to 5
customer_reviews.text: I should have know not to purchase this type of Vacuum. Didn’t last longer than three sweeps
customer_reviews.author: Jen

customer_reviews.title: Yes it sure has good suction for a good price
customer_reviews.text: Yes it sure has good suction for a good price!And we love having the dirt cup to empty and prefer a corded versus a battery.
customer_reviews.author: Diane Bizal

customer_reviews.title: Weak and noisy
customer_reviews.text: Wanted something light for small pickups rather than commit to bringing out a full size vacuum. Not worth the effort.
customer_reviews.author: Patricia Stone

customer_reviews.title: Not impressed
customer_reviews.text: Broke after 7 months of only vacuuming a 8x10 rug
customer_reviews.author: Janelle

customer_reviews.title: Bristles stopped spinning after 6 months
customer_reviews.text: I bought this 6 months ago and it did a great job at first but now the bristles stopped spinning. I’m really disappointed
customer_reviews.author: daniel cytacki

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: lives up to expectations, i use it everyday to clean up hair left behind by my cats
customer_reviews.author: Phill

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great vaccume I love it I would buy it agin

customer_reviews.title: Not perfect but does a good job. Buy it.
customer_reviews.text: This vacuum does a good job. But...it's VERY loud. I happen to own noise-cancelling headphones and that helps somewhat. Also, The bottom third -- the business end -- is much wider than in the illustration and that makes for an awkward weight distribution. Translation: this monster is HARD TO HANDLE. The rotating brush is a great feature; the vacuum is great on carpets. My advice: buy it. The good features outweigh the bad.
customer_reviews.author: Notes 88

customer_reviews.title: Designed right!
customer_reviews.text: Versatility, light weight, easy to use, powerful, easy to clean filter, and great price. The only down side is the cord could be a little longer. We bought this for a light picker upper and to take along on our winter retreats to florida. It will clean the sand from our beach cabin and our car. Thanks for a great design Dirt Devil.
customer_reviews.author: Minnesota boater

customer_reviews.title: Mission accomplished
customer_reviews.text: My only regret is that I didn't buy this thing sooner. I have a 1 year old who it all over the place and 3 dogs. I needed something for quick clean up and able to pick up dog hair. Mission accomplished!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Terrible - We have had this vacuum for less than ...
customer_reviews.text: Terrible - We have had this vacuum for less than two months (with no option of returning it) and the "Powered Brushroll" has worn/melted at each end that holds it. It no longer spins at all. The vacuum is used in a very small space for short periods of time maybe once a week or once every two weeks... fairly light and limited use. A replacement of the same kind wouldn't even be worth it.
customer_reviews.author: Amanda

customer_reviews.title: ... I have a shedding dog) but it is an excellent vacuum with good suction
customer_reviews.text: Needs to be emptied frequently (as I have a shedding dog) but it is an excellent vacuum with good suction. Its perfect for a small apartment both because it'll only need to be emptied once/twice and because its so slim and neat that storage is really easy
customer_reviews.author: Kathleen O Connell

customer_reviews.title: Very Disappointed
customer_reviews.text: Not that great on picking up stuff when pushed forward. However, does a reasonable job when pulled backwards. Unit is quite small as well. I don't return things but I am looking for another.
customer_reviews.author: Robert21

customer_reviews.title: What a great little vac especially for the price
customer_reviews.text: What a great little vac especially for the price ! Does exactly what it said it would and We have 2 dogs and lots of dog hair !
customer_reviews.author: Leeley

customer_reviews.title: Decent lightweight vac with a power brush.
customer_reviews.text: Works ok. It's light weight which is a double edged sword...nice for handling but makes it harder to get stuff up in one pass. I use it for my RV.
customer_reviews.author: JAMES

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Works well, though corded, my housekeeper uses it nearly as often as she uses the cordless Dyson vacuum.
customer_reviews.author: SiouxCityBoy

customer_reviews.title: It works for my travel trailer but wish it was a bit more powerful to suck up the dirt
customer_reviews.text: Doesn't pick up as well as I had hoped. It works for my travel trailer but wish it was a bit more powerful to suck up the dirt.
customer_reviews.author: T. Dietrich

customer_reviews.title: Nice
customer_reviews.text: It's light weight. Works well. Only thing the stick is loose
customer_reviews.author: healing touch

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: After three uses the motor started to smoke - Returned
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: Extremely noisy and the brush started sticking and would not spin about 4 months after very light use. Better to invest a few more dollars into an item that will last.
customer_reviews.author: H. Walker

customer_reviews.title: It is not suitable to use in ireland it has ...
customer_reviews.text: It is not suitable to use in ireland it has the wrong plug- this wasn't explained before I bought it.
customer_reviews.author: maeve gallagher

product_meta.title: Dirt Devil Power Express Lite Pet SD22020B, Red
product_meta.description: Style Name:Power Express Lite PetThe Dirt Devil Power Express Lite Pet is lightweight, easy to store and is perfect for small spaces and pets. This versatile vacuum is everything you need in one compact design. The stick vacuum is equipped with a powered brush roll that works hard on carpet and hard floors. It also easily converts to a hand vacuum for above floor cleaning. Just pop on the Pet Tool to tackle pet hair on upholstery, stairs, pet beds and furniture. The rinsable filter, easy empty dirt cup and compact design make it easy to use, maintain and store.
feature_bullets: GREAT FOR PETS: Includes pet hair removal tool to tackle pet hair on floors, stairs, and furniture
EDGE TO EDGE CLEANING: Direct Path technology provides edge to edge cleaning
LIGHTWEIGHT: Compact design for easy storage and use with quick cord release
3-IN-ONE: The stick vacuum is equipped with a powered brush roll that works hard on carpet and hard floors. It also easily converts to a hand vacuum for above floor cleaning
VERSATILE CLEANING: Powered brush roll that works hard on carpet and hard floors

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.3 out of 5 stars881 ratings4.3 out of 5 stars
